items.snippet: Jun 14, 2018 ... The Bill (1) amends the state's data breach notification law to require notice to affected Colorado residents and the Colorado Attorney General within 30 days.

items.title: Colorado Considers New Privacy and Data Breach Legislation
items.htmlTitle: Colorado Considers New Privacy and Data Breach Legislation
items.snippet: Jan 23, 2018 ... Colorado is the latest state to consider changing its privacy and data breach notification laws to improve protections for state residents.
items.htmlSnippet: Jan 23, 2018 ... Colorado is the latest state to consider changing its privacy and data breach notification laws to improve protections for state residents.

metatags.author: Steve Alder
metatags.og:title: Colorado Considers New Privacy and Data Breach Legislation
metatags.og:description: A bipartisan group of legislators has proposed new legislation that would enhance privacy protections for Colorado residents. Changes include an update to the types of exposed information that would require breach notifications, and a deadline for issuing notifications.
